metadata.title: CVE-2024-36844 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: libmodbus v3.1.6 was discovered to contain a use-after-free via thectx->backend pointer. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denialof Service (DoS) via a crafted message sent to the unit-test-server.

criterions.comment: libmodbus package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
